channel.description: Recent content in Bitcoin Edge Dev++ 2017 on ₿itcoin Transcripts

item.title: Bitcoin Peer-to-Peer Network and Mempool
item.description: John Newbery covers the primitives and functionality that comprises Bitcoin peer-to-peer network. This includes types of nodes that comprise the network, message format, control messages, transaction and block propagation, mempool, fee estimation, compact blocks etc.
